marklogic.body: And I thought The news was supposed to be objective in its reporting! What a crock and a slap to the face of every hard working tax paying human, not some animals who rob 12 year old lil girls. And they call themselves men! Its called stop blaming others for your problems and get a job, raise your kids right, get Off the welfare and stop popping out babies you cant afford. Now I will sit back and wait for the libs and Bleeding hearts to start calling me a racist/bigot ect ect.....
